<form ng-submit="addDisk()">
	<div class="row margin-bottom-large">
		<span class="left margin-right-medium" style="padding-top: 7px; min-width: 75px;">Name:</span>
		<input type="text" ng-model="disk.name" class="form-control width-40 left margin-right-medium" required>
	</div>
	<div class="row margin-bottom-large">
		<span class="left margin-right-medium" style="padding-top: 7px; min-width: 75px;">Size:</span>
		<input type="number" ng-model="disk.size" class="form-control width-40 left margin-right-medium" ng-pattern="/^[0-9]{1,9}$/" required>
	</div>
	<div class="row margin-bottom-large">
		<span class="left margin-right-medium" style="padding-top: 7px; min-width: 75px;">Description:</span>
		<textarea rows="4" cols="50" class="form-control width-40 left margin-right-medium" ng-model="disk.description"></textarea>
	</div>
</form>
<div class="marginTopXlarge row">
	<em class="block" ng-show="machine.status != 'HALTED'">Machine must be stopped to create disk.</em>
	<button class="btn btn-info mainButton" ng-click="createDisks()" ng-disabled="!disk.name || !disk.size || machine.status != 'HALTED'">
		<i class="fa fa-hdd-o txt-20"></i>
		<span class="margin-left-small">Create disk</span>
	</button>
</div>
